## 详细计划

1. **更新pom.xml** - 添加Spring Boot依赖和插件
2. **创建主应用类** - Spring Boot启动类
3. **创建标准的包结构**：
 - controller层 - 处理HTTP请求
 - service层 - 业务逻辑
 - repository层 - 数据访问
 - entity/model层 - 实体类
 - config层 - 配置类
 - dto层 - 数据传输对象
4. **创建配置文件** - application.yml
5. **创建测试结构**
6. **添加示例代码** - 一个简单的REST API示例

让我开始实施这个计划：

### 1. 更新pom.xml文件

findByUsername(String username);\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u90ae\u7bb1\u67e5\u627e\u7528\u6237\n * \n * @param email \u90ae\u7bb1\n * @return \u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n Optional<User> findByEmail(String email);\n\n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u7528\u6237\u540d\u662f\u5426\u5b58\u5728\n * \n * @param username \u7528\u6237\u540d\n * @return \u662f\u5426\u5b58\u5728\n */\n boolean existsByUsername(String username);\n\n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u90ae\u7bb1\u662f\u5426\u5b58\u5728\n * \n * @param email \u90ae\u7bb1\n * @return \u662f\u5426\u5b58\u5728\n */\n boolean existsByEmail(String email);\n\n /**\n * \u67e5\u627e\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n * \n * @return \u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\u5217\u8868\n */\n List<User> findByActiveTrue();\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u7528\u6237\u540d\u6a21\u7cca\u67e5\u8be2\n * \n * @param username \u7528\u6237\u540d\u5173\u952e\u5b57\n * @return \u7528\u6237\u5217\u8868\n */\n @Query(\"SELECT u FROM User u WHERE \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n * \n * @param id \u7528\u6237ID\n * @param userDTO \u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n * @return \u66f4\u65b0\u540e\u7684\u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n UserDTO updateUser(Long id, UserDTO userDTO);\n\n /**\n * \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n * \n * @param id \u7528\u6237ID\n */\n void deleteUser(Long id);\n\n /**\n * \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n * \n * @param id \u7528\u6237ID\n * @param active \u662f\u5426\u6fc0\u6d3b\n * @return \u66f4\u65b0\u540e\u7684\u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n */\n UserDTO toggleUserStatus(Long id, Boolean active);\n\n /**\n * IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/demo/service/impl/UserServiceImpl.java", "file_content": "package com.example.demo.service.impl;\n\nimport com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;\nimport com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;\nimport com.example.demo.entity.User;\nimport com.example.demo.exception.ResourceNotFoundException;\nimport com.example.demo.exception.DuplicateResourceException;\nimport com.example.demo.repository.UserRepository;\nimport com.example.demo.service.UserService;\nimport lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Page;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\nimport org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.stream.Collectors;\n\n/**\n * \u7528\u6237\u670d\u52a1\u5b9e\u73b0\u7c7b\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@Service\n@RequiredArgsConstructor\n@Transactional\npublic class UserServiceImpl implements UserService {\n\n private final UserRepository userRepository;\n\n @Override\n public UserDTO createUser(CreateUserRequest request) {\n log.info(\"Creating user with username: {}\", request.getUsername());\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u7528\u6237\u540d\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\n if (userRepository.existsByUsername(request.getUsername())) {\n throw new DuplicateResourceException(\"\u7528\u6237\u540d\u5df2\u5b58\u5728: \" + request.getUsername());\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u90ae\u7bb1\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\n if (userRepository.existsByEmail(request.getEmail())) {\n throw new DuplicateResourceException(\"\u90ae\u7bb1\u5df2\u5b58\u5728: \" + request.getEmail());\n }\n\n User user = new User();\n user.setUsername(request.getUsername());\n user.setEmail(request.getEmail());\n user.setPassword(request.getPassword()); // \u5b9e\u9645\u9879\u76ee\u4e2d\u5e94\u8be5\u52a0\u5bc6\u5bc6\u7801\n user.setFullName(request.getFullName());\n user.setPhone(request.getPhone());\n user.setActive(true);\n\n User savedUser = userRepository.save(user);\n log.info(\"User created successfully with ID: {}\", savedUser.getId());\n \n return convertToDTO(savedUser);\n }\n\n @Override\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public UserDTO getUserById(Long id) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by ID: {}\", id);\n User user = userRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException(\"\u7528\u6237\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\uff0cID: \" + id));\n return convertToDTO(user);\n }\n\n @Override\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public UserDTO getUserByUsername(String username) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by username: {}\", username);\n User user = userRepository.findByUsername(username)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException(\"\u7528\u6237\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\uff0c\u7528\u6237\u540d: \" + username));\n return convertToDTO(user);\n }\n\n @Override\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Page<UserDTO> getAllUsers(Pageable pageable) {\n log.info(\"Getting all users with pagination\");\n Page<User> users = userRepository.findAll(pageable);\n return users.map(this::convertToDTO);\n }\n\n @Override\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List<UserDTO> getActiveUsers() {\n log.info(\"Getting active users\");\n List<User> activeUsers = userRepository.findByActiveTrue();\n return activeUsers.stream()\n .map(this::convertToDTO)\n .collect(Collectors.toList());\n }\n\n @Override\n public UserDTO updateUser(Long id, UserDTO userDTO) {\n log.info(\"Updating user with ID: {}\", id);\n User existingUser = userRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException(\"\u7528\u6237\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\uff0cID: \" + id));\n\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u7528\u6237\u540d\u662f\u5426\u88ab\u5176\u4ed6\u7528\u6237\u4f7f\u7528\n if (!existingUser.getUsername().equals(userDTO.getUsername()) && \n userRepository.existsByUsername(userDTO.getUsername())) {\n throw new DuplicateResourceException(\"\u7528\u6237\u540d\u5df2\u5b58\u5728: \" + userDTO.getUsername());\n }\n\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u90ae\u7bb1\u662f\u5426\u88ab\u5176\u4ed6\u7528\u6237\u4f7f\u7528\n if (!existingUser.getEmail().equals(userDTO.getEmail()) && \n userRepository.existsByEmail(userDTO.getEmail())) {\n throw new DuplicateResourceException(\"\u90ae\u7bb1\u5df2\u5b58\u5728: \" + userDTO.getEmail());\n }\n\n existingUser.setUsername(userDTO.getUsername());\n existingUser.setEmail(userDTO.getEmail());\n existingUser.setFullName(userDTO.getFullName());\n existingUser.setPhone(userDTO.getPhone());\n existingUser.setActive(userDTO.getActive());\n\n User updatedUser = userRepository.save(existingUser);\n log.info(\"User updated successfully with ID: {}\", updatedUser.getId());\n \n return convertToDTO(updatedUser);\n }\n\n @Override\n public void deleteUser(Long id) {\n log.info(\"Deleting user with ID: {}\", id);\n if (!userRepository.existsById(id)) {\n throw new ResourceNotFoundException(\"\u7528\u6237\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\uff0cID: \" + id);\n }\n userRepository.deleteById(id);\n log.info(\"User deleted successfully with ID: {}\", id);\n }\n\n @Override\n public UserDTO toggleUserStatus(Long id, Boolean active) {\n log.info(\"Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}\", id, active);\n User user = userRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new ResourceNotFoundException(\"\u7528\u6237\u4e0d\u5b58\u5728\uff0cID: \" + id));\n \n user.setActive(active);\n User updatedUser = userRepository.save(user);\n log.info(\"User status updated successfully for ID: {}\", id);\n \n return convertToDTO(updatedUser);\n }\n\n @Override\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List<UserDTO> searchUsersByUsername(String username) {\n log.info(\"Searching users by username: {}\", username);\n List<User> users = userRepository.findByUsernameContaining(username);\n return users.stream()\n .map(this::convertToDTO)\n .collect(Collectors.toList());\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5c06User\u5b9e\u4f53\u8f6c\u6362\u4e3aUserDTO\n */\n private UserDTO convertToDTO(User user) {\n UserDTO dto = new UserDTO();\n dto.setId(user.getId());\n dto.setUsername(user.getUsername());\n dto.setEmail(user.getEmail());\n dto.setFullName(user.getFullName());\n dto.setPhone(user.getPhone());\n dto.setActive(user.getActive());\n dto.setCreatedAt(user.getCreatedAt());\n dto.setUpdatedAt(user.getUpdatedAt());\n return dto;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"### 8. 创建Service实现类

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/demo/exception/GlobalExceptionHandler.java", "file_content": "package com.example.demo.exception;\n\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.validation.FieldError;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ExceptionHandler;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestControllerAdvice;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.HashMap;\nimport java.util.Map;\n\n/**\n * \u5168\u5c40\u5f02\u5e38\u5904\u7406\u5668\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@RestControllerAdvice\npublic class GlobalExceptionHandler {\n\n /**\n * \u5904\u7406\u8d44\u6e90\u672a\u627e\u5230\u5f02\u5e38\n */\n @ExceptionHandler(ResourceNotFoundException.class)\n public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleResourceNotFoundException(ResourceNotFoundException ex) {\n log.error(\"Resource not found: {}\", ex.getMessage());\n ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()\n .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\n .status(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.value())\n .error(\"Not Found\")\n .message(ex.getMessage())\n .build();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5904\u7406\u91cd\u590d\u8d44\u6e90\u5f02\u5e38\n */\n @ExceptionHandler(DuplicateResourceException.class)\n public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleDuplicateResourceException(DuplicateResourceException ex) {\n log.error(\"Duplicate resource: {}\", ex.getMessage());\n ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()\n .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\n .status(HttpStatus.CONFLICT.value())\n .error(\"Conflict\")\n .message(ex.getMessage())\n .build();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.CONFLICT);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5904\u7406\u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\u5f02\u5e38\n */\n @ExceptionHandler(MethodArgumentNotValidException.class)\n public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleValidationExceptions(MethodArgumentNotValidException ex) {\n log.error(\"Validation error: {}\", ex.getMessage());\n Map<String, String> errors = new HashMap<>();\n ex.getBindingResult().getAllErrors().forEach((error) -> {\n String fieldName = ((FieldError) error).getField();\n String errorMessage = error.getDefaultMessage();\n errors.put(fieldName, errorMessage);\n });\n\n ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()\n .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\n .status(HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.value())\n .error(\"Validation Failed\")\n .message(\"\u8f93\u5165\u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\u5931\u8d25\")\n .validationErrors(errors)\n .build();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5904\u7406\u901a\u7528\u5f02\u5e38\n */\n @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class)\n public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleGenericException(Exception ex) {\n log.error(\"Unexpected error: \", ex);\n ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()\n .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())\n .status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.value())\n .error(\"Internal Server Error\")\n .message(\"\u670d\u52a1\u5668\u5185\u90e8\u9519\u8bef\")\n .build();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u9519\u8bef\u54cd\u5e94\u7c7b\n */\n @lombok.Data\n @lombok.Builder\n public static class ErrorResponse {\n private LocalDateTime timestamp;\n private int status;\n private String error;\n private String message;\n private IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/demo/controller/UserController.java", "file_content": "package com.example.demo.controller;\n\nimport com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;\nimport com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;\nimport com.example.demo.service.UserService;\nimport jakarta.validation.Valid;\nimport lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Page;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * \u7528\u6237\u63a7\u5236\u5668\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/users\")\n@RequiredArgsConstructor\npublic class UserController {\n\n private final UserService userService;\n\n /**\n * \u521b\u5efa\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {\n log.info(\"Creating user: {}\", request.getUsername());\n UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636eID\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u7528\u6237\u540d\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/username/{username}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by username: {}\", username);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u7528\u6237\uff08\u5206\u9875\uff09\n */\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"0\") int page,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"10\") int size,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"id\") String sortBy,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"asc\") String sortDir) {\n \n log.info(\"Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}\", \n page, size, sortBy, sortDir);\n \n Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase(\"desc\") ? \n Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();\n Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);\n \n Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/active\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getActiveUsers() {\n log.info(\"Getting active users\");\n List<UserDTO> activeUsers = userService.getActiveUsers();\n return ResponseEntity.ok(activeUsers);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, \n @Valid @RequestBody UserDTO userDTO) {\n log.info(\"Updating user with ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.updateUser(id, userDTO);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n */\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Deleting user with ID: {}\", id);\n userService.deleteUser(id);\n return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PatchMapping(\"/{id}/status\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, \n @RequestParam Boolean active) {\n log.info(\"Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}\", id, active);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/search\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {\n log.info(\"Searching users by username: {}\", username);\n List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"### 11. 创建Controller

"file_content": "package com.example.demo.controller;\n\nimport com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;\nimport com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;\nimport com.example.demo.service.UserService;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;\nimport org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.web.servlet.WebMvcTest;\nimport org.springframework.boot.test.mock.mockito.MockBean;\nimport org.springframework.http.MediaType;\nimport org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\n\nimport static org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers.any;\nimport static org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers.eq;\nimport static org.mockito.Mockito.when;\nimport static org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request.MockMvcRequestBuilders.*;\nimport static org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultMatchers.*;\n\n@WebMvcTest(UserController.class)\nclass UserControllerTest {\n\n @Autowired\n private MockMvc mockMvc;\n\n @MockBean\n private UserService userService;\n\n @Autowired\n private ObjectMapper objectMapper;\n\n @Test\n void createUser_ShouldReturnCreatedUser() throws Exception {\n // Given\n CreateUserRequest request = new CreateUserRequest();\n request.setUsername(\"testuser\");\n request.setEmail(\"test@example.com\");\n request.setPassword(\"password123\");\n request.setFullName(\"Test User\");\n\n UserDTO expectedUser = new UserDTO();\n expectedUser.setId(1L);\n expectedUser.setUsername(\"testuser\");\n expectedUser.setEmail(\"test@example.com\");\n expectedUser.setFullName(\"Test User\");\n expectedUser.setActive(true);\n expectedUser.setCreatedAt(LocalDateTime.now());\n\n when(userService.createUser(any(CreateUserRequest.class))).thenReturn(expectedUser);\n\n // When & Then\n mockMvc.perform(post(\"/api/users\")\n .contentType(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)\n .content(objectMapper.writeValueAsString(request)))\n .andExpect(status().isCreated())\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.id\").value(1L))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.username\").value(\"testuser\"))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.email\").value(\"test@example.com\"))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.fullName\").value(\"Test User\"))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.active\").value(true));\n }\n\n @Test\n void getUserById_ShouldReturnUser() throws Exception {\n // Given\n Long userId = 1L;\n UserDTO expectedUser = new UserDTO();\n expectedUser.setId(userId);\n expectedUser.setUsername(\"testuser\");\n expectedUser.setEmail(\"test@example.com\");\n expectedUser.setActive(true);\n\n when(userService.getUserById(userId)).thenReturn(expectedUser);\n\n // When & Then\n mockMvc.perform(get(\"/api/users/{id}\", userId))\n .andExpect(status().isOk())\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.id\").value(userId))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.username\").value(\"testuser\"))\n .andExpect(jsonPath(\"$.email\").value(\"test@example.com\"));\n }\n\n @Test\n void createUser_WithInvalidData_ShouldReturnBadRequest() throws Exception {\n // Given\n CreateUserRequest request = new CreateUserRequest();\n request.setUsername(\"\"); // Invalid: empty username\n request.setEmail(\"invalid-email\"); // Invalid: bad email format\n request.setPassword(\"123\"); // Invalid: too short\n\n // When & Then\n mockMvc.perform(post(\"/api/users\")\n .contentType(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)\n .content(objectMapper.writeValueAsString(request)))\n .andExpect(status().isBadRequest());\n }\n\n @Test\n void deleteUser_ShouldReturnNoContent() throws Exception {\n // Given\n Long userId = 1L;\n\n // When & Then\n mockMvc.perform(delete(\"/api/users/{id}\", userId))\n .andExpect(status().isNoContent());\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "README.md", "file_content": "# Spring Boot Demo Project\n\n\u8fd9\u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u6807\u51c6\u7684Spring Boot\u9879\u76ee\u793a\u4f8b\uff0c\u5c55\u793a\u4e86\u5982\u4f55\u6784\u5efa\u4e00\u4e2a\u5b8c\u6574\u7684RESTful API\u5e94\u7528\u3002\n\n## \u9879\u76ee\u7ed3\u6784\n\n```\nsrc/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 main/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 java/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 com/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 example/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 demo/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 SpringbootDemoApplication.java # \u4e3b\u5e94\u7528\u7c7b\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 controller/ # \u63a7\u5236\u5668\u5c42\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 UserController.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 service/ # \u670d\u52a1\u5c42\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 UserService.java # \u670d\u52a1\u63a5\u53e3\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 impl/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 UserServiceImpl.java # \u670d\u52a1\u5b9e\u73b0\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 repository/ # \u6570\u636e\u8bbf\u95ee\u5c42\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 UserRepository.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 entity/ # \u5b9e\u4f53\u7c7b\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 User.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 dto/ # \u6570\u636e\u4f20\u8f93\u5bf9\u8c61\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 UserDTO.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 CreateUserRequest.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 exception/ # \u5f02\u5e38\u5904\u7406\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 ResourceNotFoundException.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 DuplicateResourceException.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 GlobalExceptionHandler.java\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 config/ # \u914d\u7f6e\u7c7b\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 resources/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 application.yml # \u5e94\u7528\u914d\u7f6e\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 static/ # \u9759\u6001\u8d44\u6e90\n\u2514\u2500\u2500 test/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 java/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 com/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 example/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 demo/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 SpringbootDemoApplicationTests.java\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 controller/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 UserControllerTest.java\n```\n\n## \u6280\u672f\u6808\n\n- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - \u4e3b\u6846\u67b6\n- **Spring Data JPA** - \u6570\u636e\u8bbf\u95ee\n- **Spring Web** - Web\u5c42\n- **H2 Database** - \u5185\u5b58\u6570\u636e\u5e93\uff08\u5f00\u53d1\u73af\u5883\uff09\n- **MySQL** - \u751f\u4ea7\u6570\u636e\u5e93\n- **Lombok** - \u51cf\u5c11\u6837\u677f\u4ee3\u7801\n- **JUnit 5** - \u5355\u5143\u6d4b\u8bd5\n- **Maven** - \u6784\u5efa\u5de5\u5177\n\n## \u529f\u80fd\u7279\u6027\n\n### \u7528\u6237\u7ba1\u7406API\n- \u2705 \u521b\u5efa\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u6839\u636eID\u67e5\u8be2\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u6839\u636e\u7528\u6237\u540d\u67e5\u8be2\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u5206\u9875\u67e5\u8be2\u6240\u6709\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u67e5\u8be2\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\u4fe1\u606f\n- \u2705 \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n- \u2705 \u7528\u6237\u540d\u641c\u7d22\n\n### \u6280\u672f\u7279\u6027\n- \u2705 \u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\n- \u2705 \u5168\u5c40\u5f02\u5e38\u5904\u7406\n- \u2705 \u5206\u9875\u548c\u6392\u5e8f\n- \u2705 \u4e8b\u52a1\u7ba1\u7406\n- \u2705 \u5355\u5143\u6d4b\u8bd5\n- \u2705 \u65e5\u5fd7\u8bb0\u5f55\n\n## \u5feb\u901f\u5f00\u59cb\n\n### 1. \u514b\u9686\u9879\u76ee\n```bash\ngit clone <repository-url>\ncd springboot-demo\n```\n\n### 2. \u8fd0\u884c\u9879\u76ee\n```bash\nmvn spring-boot:run\n```\n\n### 3. \u8bbf\u95ee\u5e94\u7528\n- \u5e94\u7528\u5730\u5740: http://localhost:8080\n- H2\u63a7\u5236\u53f0: http://localhost:8080/h2-console\n - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:testdb`\n - \u7528\u6237\u540d: `sa`\n - \u5bc6\u7801: `password`\n\n## API\u6587\u6863\n\n### \u7528\u6237\u7ba1\u7406\u63a5\u53e3\n\n#### \u521b\u5efa\u7528\u6237\n```http\nPOST /api/users\nContent-Type: application/json\n\n{\n \"username\": \"testuser\",\n \"email\": \"test@example.com\",\n \"password\": \"password123\",\n \"fullName\": \"Test User\",\n \"phone\": \"1234567890\"\n}\n```\n\n#### \u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n```http\nGET /api/users/{id}\nGET /api/users/username/{username}\n```\n\n#### \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u7528\u6237\uff08\u5206\u9875\uff09\n```http\nGET /api/users?page=0&size=10&sortBy=id&sortDir=asc\n```\n\n#### \u83b7\u53d6\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n```http\nGET /api/users/active\n```\n\n#### \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\n```http\nPUT /api/users/{id}\nContent-Type: application/json\n\n{\n \"username\": \"updateduser\",\n \"email\": \"updated@example.com\",\n \"fullName\": \"Updated User\",\n \"phone\": \"0987654321\",\n \"active\": true\n}\n```\n\n#### \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n```http\nDELETE /api/users/{id}\n```\n\n#### \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n```http\nPATCH /api/users/{id}/status?active=true\n```\n\n#### \u641c\u7d22\u7528\u6237\n```http\nGET /api/users/search?username=test\n```\n\n## \u6d4b\u8bd5\n\n### \u8fd0\u884c\u6240\u6709\u6d4b\u8bd5\n```bash\nmvn test\n```\n\n### \u8fd0\u884c\u7279\u5b9a\u6d4b\u8bd5\n```bash\nmvn test -Dtest=UserControllerTest\n```\n\n## \u914d\u7f6e\n\n### 我已经为您成功构建了一个完整的Spring Boot项目结构。以下是项目的主要特点：

### 项目结构概览

```
springboot-demo/
├── pom.xml # Maven配置文件
├── README.md # 项目说明文档
└── src/
 ├── main/
 │ ├── java/com/example/demo/
 │ │ ├── SpringbootDemoApplication.java # 主启动类
 │ │ ├── controller/ # 控制器层
 │ │ │ └── UserController.java
 │ │ ├── service/ # 服务层
 │ │ │ ├── UserService.java
 │ │ │ └── impl/UserServiceImpl.java
 │ │ ├── repository/ # 数据访问层
 │ │ │ └── UserRepository.java
 │ │ ├── entity/ # 实体类
 │ │ │ └── User.java
 │ │ ├── dto/ # 数据传输对象
 │ │ │ ├── UserDTO.java
 │ │ │ └── CreateUserRequest.java
 │ │ └── exception/ # 异常处理
 │ │ ├── ResourceNotFoundException.java
 │ │ ├── DuplicateResourceException.java
 │ │ └── GlobalExceptionHandler.java
 │ └── resources/
 │ └── application.yml # 应用配置文件
 └── test/
 └── java/com/example/demo/
 ├── SpringbootDemoApplicationTests.java
 └── controller/UserControllerTest.java
```

### 主要功能

1. **完整的用户管理API**：
 - 创建、查询、更新、删除用户
 - 分页查询和搜索功能
 - 用户状态管理

2. **技术特性**：
 - Spring Boot 3.2.0
 - Spring Data JPA
 - 参数验证
 - 全局异常处理
 - 事务管理
 - 单元测试

3. **数据库支持**：
 - 开发环境：H2内存数据库
 - 生产环境：MySQL数据库

### ️ 下一步操作

您现在可以：

1. **运行项目**：
 ```bash
 mvn spring-boot:run
 ```

2. **访问应用**：
 - 应用地址：http://localhost:8080
 - H2控制台：http://localhost:8080/h2-console

3. **测试API**：使用Postman或curl测试用户管理接口

4. **运行测试**：
 ```bash
 mvn test
 ```

这个项目结构遵循了Spring Boot的最佳实践，包含了完整的分层架构、异常处理、数据验证和测试代码。您可以基于这个结构继续开发更多功能！

 45	
 46	## 技术栈
 47	
 48	- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - 主框架
 49	- **Spring Data JPA** - 数据访问
 50	- **Spring Web** - Web层
 51	- **H2 Database** - 内存数据库（开发环境）
 52	- **MySQL** - 生产数据库
 53	- **Lombok** - 减少样板代码
 54	- **JUnit 5** - 单元测试
 55	- **Maven** - 构建工具
 56	
 57	## 功能特性
 58	
 59	### 用户管理API
 60	- ✅ 创建用户
 61	- ✅ 根据ID查询用户
 62	- ✅ 根据用户名查询用户
 63	- ✅ 分页查询所有用户
 64	- ✅ 查询活跃用户
 65	- ✅ 更新用户信息
 66	- ✅ 删除用户
 67	- ✅ 激活/停用用户
 68	- ✅ 用户名搜索
 69	
 70	### 技术特性
 71	- ✅ 参数验证
 72	- ✅ 全局异常处理
 73	- ✅ 分页和排序
 74	- ✅ 事务管理
 75	- ✅ 单元测试
 76	- ✅ 日志记录
 77	
 78	## 快速开始
 79	
 80	### 1. 克隆项目
 81	```bash
 82	git clone <repository-url>
 83	cd springboot-demo
 84	```
 85	
 86	### 2. 运行项目
 87	```bash
 88	mvn spring-boot:run
 89	```
 90	
 91	### 3. 访问应用
 92	- 应用地址: http://localhost:8080
 93	- H2控制台: http://localhost:8080/h2-console
 94	 - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:testdb`
 95	 - 用户名: `sa`
 96	 - 密码: `password`
...
 144	```
 145	
 146	#### 删除用户
 147	```http
 148	DELETE /api/users/{id}
 149	```
 150	
 151	#### 激活/停用用户
 152	```http
 153	PATCH /api/users/{id}/status?active=true
 154	```
 155	
 156	#### 搜索用户
 157	```http
 158	GET /api/users/search?username=test
 159	```
 160	
 161	## 测试
 162	
 163	### 运行所有测试
 164	```bash
 165	mvn test
 166	```
 167	
 168	### 运行特定测试
 169	```bash
 170	mvn test -Dtest=UserControllerTest
 171	```
 172	
 173	## 配置
 174	
 175	### 开发环境
 176	项目默认使用H2内存数据库，无需额外配置。
 177	
 178	### 生产环境
 179	1. 修改 `application.yml` 中的数据库配置
 180	2. 取消MySQL配置的注释
 181	3. 注释掉H2相关配置
 182	
 183	## 部署
 184	
 185	### 构建JAR包
 186	```bash
 187	mvn clean package
 188	```
 189	
 190	### 运行JAR包
 191	```bash
 192	java -jar target/springboot-demo-1.0.0.jar
 193	```
 194	
 195	## 贡献
 196	
 197	1. Fork 项目
 198	2. 创建特性分支 (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
 199	3. 提交更改 (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
 200	4. 推送到分支 (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
 201	5. 打开 Pull Request
 202	
 203	## 许可证
 204	
 205	本项目采用 MIT 许可证 - 查看 [LICENSE](LICENSE) 文件了解详情。

Path: src/main/java/com/example/demo/controller/UserController.java
 1	package com.example.demo.controller;
 2	
 3	import com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;
 4	import com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;
 5	import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
 6	import jakarta.validation.Valid;
 7	import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
 8	import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
 9	import org.springframework.data.domain.Page;
 10	import org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;
 11	import org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;
 12	import org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;
 13	import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
 14	import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
 15	import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
 16	
 17	import java.util.List;
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * 用户控制器
 21	 * 
 22	 * @author example
 23	 * @version 1.0.0
 24	 */
 25	@Slf4j
 26	@RestController
 27	@RequestMapping("/api/users")
 28	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 29	public class UserController {
 30	
 31	 private final UserService userService;
 32	
 33	 /**
 34	 * 创建用户
 35	 */
 36	 @PostMapping
 37	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {
 38	 log.info("Creating user: {}", request.getUsername());
 39	 UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);
 40	 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 /**
 44	 * 根据ID获取用户
 45	 */
 46	 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 47	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 48	 log.info("Getting user by ID: {}", id);
 49	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);
 50	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 51	 }
...
 62	
 63	 /**
 64	 * 获取所有用户（分页）
 65	 */
 66	 @GetMapping
 67	 public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(
 68	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "0") int page,
 69	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") int size,
 70	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "id") String sortBy,
 71	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "asc") String sortDir) {
 72	 
 73	 log.info("Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}", 
 74	 page, size, sortBy, sortDir);
 75	 
 76	 Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase("desc") ? 
 77	 Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();
 78	 Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);
 79	 
 80	 Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);
 81	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 82	 }
...
 114	
 115	 /**
 116	 * 激活/停用用户
 117	 */
 118	 @PatchMapping("/{id}/status")
 119	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, 
 120	 @RequestParam Boolean active) {
 121	 log.info("Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}", id, active);
 122	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);
 123	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 124	 }
 125	
 126	 /**
 127	 * 搜索用户
 128	 */
 129	 @GetMapping("/search")
 130	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {
 131	 log.info("Searching users by username: {}", username);
 132	 List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);
 133	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 134	 }

 20	@Table(name = "users")

 22	@NoArgsConstructor
 23	@AllArgsConstructor

 25	
 26	 @Id
 27	 @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)
 28	 private Long id;
 29	
 30	 @NotBlank(message = "用户名不能为空")
 31	 @Size(min = 3, max = 50, message = "用户名长度必须在3-50个字符之间")
 32	 @Column(name = "username", nullable = false, unique = true, length = 50)
 33	 private String username;
 34	
 35	 @NotBlank(message = "邮箱不能为空")
 36	 @Email(message = "邮箱格式不正确")
 37	 @Column(name = "email", nullable = false, unique = true, length = 100)
 38	 private String email;
 39	
 40	 @NotBlank(message = "密码不能为空")
 41	 @Size(min = 6, message = "密码长度不能少于6个字符")
 42	 @Column(name = "password", nullable = false)
 43	 private String password;
 44	
 45	 @Column(name = "full_name", length = 100)
 46	 private String fullName;
 47	
 48	 @Column(name = "phone", length = 20)
 49	 private String phone;
 50	
 51	 @Column(name = "active", nullable = false)
 52	 private Boolean active = true;
 53	
 54	 @Column(name = "created_at", nullable = false, updatable = false)
 55	 private LocalDateTime createdAt;
 56	
 57	 @Column(name = "updated_at")
 58	 private LocalDateTime updatedAt;
 59	
 60	 @PrePersist
 61	 protected void onCreate() {
 62	 createdAt = LocalDateTime.now();
 63	 updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();
 64	 }
 65	
 66	 @PreUpdate
 67	 protected void onUpdate() {
 68	 updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();
 69	 }
 70	}

 15	 sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 16	 isFirstFrame = false;
 17	 } else {
 18	 sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 19	 }
 20	 }

 23	 webSocketClient.sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 24	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusContinueFrame;
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 private void sendContinueFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 28	 webSocketClient.sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 29	 }
 30

 32	 webSocketClient.sendLastFrame();
 33	 isFirstFrame = true;
 34	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusFirstFrame;
 35	 }

 45	
 46	## 技术栈
 47	
 48	- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - 主框架
 49	- **Spring Data JPA** - 数据访问
 50	- **Spring Web** - Web层
 51	- **H2 Database** - 内存数据库（开发环境）
 52	- **MySQL** - 生产数据库
 53	- **Lombok** - 减少样板代码
 54	- **JUnit 5** - 单元测试
 55	- **Maven** - 构建工具
 56	
 57	## 功能特性
 58	
 59	### 用户管理API
 60	- ✅ 创建用户
 61	- ✅ 根据ID查询用户
 62	- ✅ 根据用户名查询用户
 63	- ✅ 分页查询所有用户
 64	- ✅ 查询活跃用户
 65	- ✅ 更新用户信息
 66	- ✅ 删除用户
 67	- ✅ 激活/停用用户
 68	- ✅ 用户名搜索
 69	
 70	### 技术特性
 71	- ✅ 参数验证
 72	- ✅ 全局异常处理
 73	- ✅ 分页和排序
 74	- ✅ 事务管理
 75	- ✅ 单元测试
 76	- ✅ 日志记录
 77	
 78	## 快速开始
 79	
 80	### 1. 克隆项目
 81	```bash
 82	git clone <repository-url>
 83	cd springboot-demo
 84	```
 85	
 86	### 2. 运行项目
 87	```bash
 88	mvn spring-boot:run
 89	```
 90	
 91	### 3. 访问应用
 92	- 应用地址: http://localhost:8080
 93	- H2控制台: http://localhost:8080/h2-console
 94	 - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:testdb`
 95	 - 用户名: `sa`
 96	 - 密码: `password`
...
 144	```
 145	
 146	#### 删除用户
 147	```http
 148	DELETE /api/users/{id}
 149	```
 150	
 151	#### 激活/停用用户
 152	```http
 153	PATCH /api/users/{id}/status?active=true
 154	```
 155	
 156	#### 搜索用户
 157	```http
 158	GET /api/users/search?username=test
 159	```
 160	
 161	## 测试
 162	
 163	### 运行所有测试
 164	```bash
 165	mvn test
 166	```
 167	
 168	### 运行特定测试
 169	```bash
 170	mvn test -Dtest=UserControllerTest
 171	```
 172	
 173	## 配置
 174	
 175	### 开发环境
 176	项目默认使用H2内存数据库，无需额外配置。
 177	
 178	### 生产环境
 179	1. 修改 `application.yml` 中的数据库配置
 180	2. 取消MySQL配置的注释
 181	3. 注释掉H2相关配置
 182	
 183	## 部署
 184	
 185	### 构建JAR包
 186	```bash
 187	mvn clean package
 188	```
 189	
 190	### 运行JAR包
 191	```bash
 192	java -jar target/springboot-demo-1.0.0.jar
 193	```
 194	
 195	## 贡献
 196	
 197	1. Fork 项目
 198	2. 创建特性分支 (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
 199	3. 提交更改 (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
 200	4. 推送到分支 (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
 201	5. 打开 Pull Request
 202	
 203	## 许可证
 204	
 205	本项目采用 MIT 许可证 - 查看 [LICENSE](LICENSE) 文件了解详情。

 14	
 15	/**
 16	 * 全局异常处理器
 17	 * 
 18	 * @author example
 19	 * @version 1.0.0
 20	 */
 21	@Slf4j
 22	@RestControllerAdvice
 23	public class GlobalExceptionHandler {
 24	
 25	 /**
 26	 * 处理资源未找到异常
 27	 */
 28	 @ExceptionHandler(ResourceNotFoundException.class)
 29	 public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleResourceNotFoundException(ResourceNotFoundException ex) {
 30	 log.error("Resource not found: {}", ex.getMessage());
 31	 ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()
 32	 .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())
 33	 .status(HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.value())
 34	 .error("Not Found")
 35	 .message(ex.getMessage())
 36	 .build();
 37	 return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
 38	 }
...
 77	
 78	 /**
 79	 * 处理通用异常
 80	 */
 81	 @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class)
 82	 public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleGenericException(Exception ex) {
 83	 log.error("Unexpected error: ", ex);
 84	 ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorResponse.builder()
 85	 .timestamp(LocalDateTime.now())
 86	 .status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.value())
 87	 .error("Internal Server Error")
 88	 .message("服务器内部错误")
 89	 .build();
 90	 return new ResponseEntity<>(errorResponse, HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
 91	 }
 92	
 93	 /**
 94	 * 错误响应类
 95	 */
 96	 @lombok.Data
 97	 @lombok.Builder
 98	 public static class ErrorResponse {
 99	 private LocalDateTime timestamp;
 100	 private int status;
 101	 private String error;
 102	 private String message;
 103	 private Map<String, String> validationErrors;
 104	 }
 105	}

 5	import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
 6	import jakarta.validation.Valid;
 7	import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
 8	import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
 9	import org.springframework.data.domain.Page;
 10	import org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;
 11	import org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;
 12	import org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;
 13	import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
 14	import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
 15	import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
 16	
 17	import java.util.List;
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * 用户控制器
 21	 * 
 22	 * @author example
 23	 * @version 1.0.0
 24	 */
 25	@Slf4j
 26	@RestController
 27	@RequestMapping("/api/users")
 28	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 29	public class UserController {
 30	
 31	 private final UserService userService;
 32	
 33	 /**
 34	 * 创建用户
 35	 */
 36	 @PostMapping
 37	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {
 38	 log.info("Creating user: {}", request.getUsername());
 39	 UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);
 40	 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 /**
 44	 * 根据ID获取用户
 45	 */
 46	 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 47	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 48	 log.info("Getting user by ID: {}", id);
 49	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);
 50	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 51	 }
 52	
 53	 /**
 54	 * 根据用户名获取用户
 55	 */
 56	 @GetMapping("/username/{username}")
 57	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {
 58	 log.info("Getting user by username: {}", username);
 59	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);
 60	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 /**
 64	 * 获取所有用户（分页）
 65	 */
 66	 @GetMapping
 67	 public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(
 68	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "0") int page,
 69	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") int size,
 70	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "id") String sortBy,
 71	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "asc") String sortDir) {
 72	 
 73	 log.info("Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}", 
 74	 page, size, sortBy, sortDir);
 75	 
 76	 Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase("desc") ? 
 77	 Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();
 78	 Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);
 79	 
 80	 Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);
 81	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 82	 }
 83	
 84	 /**
 85	 * 获取活跃用户
 86	 */
 87	 @GetMapping("/active")
 88	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getActiveUsers() {
 89	 log.info("Getting active users");
 90	 List<UserDTO> activeUsers = userService.getActiveUsers();
 91	 return ResponseEntity.ok(activeUsers);
 92	 }
 93	
 94	 /**
 95	 * 更新用户
 96	 */
 97	 @PutMapping("/{id}")
 98	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, 
 99	 @Valid @RequestBody UserDTO userDTO) {
 100	 log.info("Updating user with ID: {}", id);
 101	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.updateUser(id, userDTO);
 102	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 103	 }
 104	
 105	 /**
 106	 * 删除用户
 107	 */
 108	 @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
 109	 public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) {
 110	 log.info("Deleting user with ID: {}", id);
 111	 userService.deleteUser(id);
 112	 return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();
 113	 }
 114	
 115	 /**
 116	 * 激活/停用用户
 117	 */
 118	 @PatchMapping("/{id}/status")
 119	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, 
 120	 @RequestParam Boolean active) {
 121	 log.info("Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}", id, active);
 122	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);
 123	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 124	 }
 125	
 126	 /**
 127	 * 搜索用户
 128	 */
 129	 @GetMapping("/search")
 130	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {
 131	 log.info("Searching users by username: {}", username);
 132	 List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);
 133	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 134	 }
 135	}

Path: src/main/java/com/example/demo/service/AudioCaptureService.java
 1	package com.example.demo.service;
 2	@Service
 3	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 4	public class AudioCaptureService {
 5	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AudioCaptureService.class);
 6	
 7	 private final SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService;
 8	
 9	 private TargetDataLine targetDataLine;
 10	 private boolean isCapturing = false;
 11	
 12	 // 音频格式配置
 13	 private static final AudioFormat AUDIO_FORMAT = new AudioFormat(
 14	 16000, // 采样率 16kHz
 15	 16, // 采样位数
 16	 1, // 单声道
 17	 true, // 有符号
 18	 false // 小端序
 19	 );
 20	
 21	 public void startCapture() {
 22	 if (isCapturing) {
 23	 logger.warn("Audio capture is already running");
 24	 return;
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 try {
 28	 DataLine.Info info = new DataLine.Info(TargetDataLine.class, AUDIO_FORMAT);
 29	 targetDataLine = (TargetDataLine) AudioSystem.getLine(info);
 30	 targetDataLine.open(AUDIO_FORMAT);
 31	 targetDataLine.start();
 32	
 33	 isCapturing = true;
 34	 new Thread(this::captureAudio).start();
 35	 logger.info("Audio capture started");
 36	 } catch (LineUnavailableException e) {
 37	 logger.error("Failed to start audio capture", e);
 38	 }
 39	 }
 40	
 41	 public void stopCapture() {
 42	 isCapturing = false;
 43	 if (targetDataLine != null) {
 44	 targetDataLine.stop();
 45	 targetDataLine.close();
 46	 logger.info("Audio capture stopped");
 47	 }
 48	 }
 49	
 50	 private void captureAudio() {
 51	 int frameSize = 1280; // 每40ms的音频数据 (16000Hz * 16bit * 1channel * 0.04s / 8 = 1280 bytes)
 52	 byte[] buffer = new byte[frameSize];
 53	
 54	 while (isCapturing) {
 55	 int bytesRead = targetDataLine.read(buffer, 0, frameSize);
 56	 if (bytesRead > 0) {
 57	 recognitionService.processAudioFrame(buffer, bytesRead);
 58	 }
 59	 }
 60	 }
 61	}...
Path: src/main/java/com/example/demo/service/SpeechRecognitionService.java
 1	package com.example.demo.service;
 2	
 3	@Service
 4	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 5	public class SpeechRecognitionService {
 6	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SpeechRecognitionService.class);
 7	
 8	 private final IatWebSocketClient webSocketClient;
 9	
 10	 private int status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusFirstFrame;
 11	 private boolean isFirstFrame = true;
 12	
 13	 public void processAudioFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 14	 if (isFirstFrame) {
 15	 sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 16	 isFirstFrame = false;
 17	 } else {
 18	 sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 19	 }
 20	 }
 21	
 22	 private void sendFirstFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 23	 webSocketClient.sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 24	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusContinueFrame;
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 private void sendContinueFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 28	 webSocketClient.sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 public void endRecognition() {
 32	 webSocketClient.sendLastFrame();
 33	 isFirstFrame = true;
 34	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusFirstFrame;
 35	 }
 36	
 37	 public void handleRecognitionResult(String result) {
 38	 // 处理识别结果，可以通过事件或WebSocket转发给前端
 39	 logger.info("Recognition result: {}", result);
 40	 }
 41	}...

 45	
 46	## 技术栈
 47	
 48	- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - 主框架
 49	- **Spring Data JPA** - 数据访问
 50	- **Spring Web** - Web层
 51	- **H2 Database** - 内存数据库（开发环境）
 52	- **MySQL** - 生产数据库
 53	- **Lombok** - 减少样板代码
 54	- **JUnit 5** - 单元测试
 55	- **Maven** - 构建工具
 56	
 57	## 功能特性
 58	
 59	### 用户管理API
 60	- ✅ 创建用户
 61	- ✅ 根据ID查询用户
 62	- ✅ 根据用户名查询用户
 63	- ✅ 分页查询所有用户
 64	- ✅ 查询活跃用户
 65	- ✅ 更新用户信息
 66	- ✅ 删除用户
 67	- ✅ 激活/停用用户
 68	- ✅ 用户名搜索
 69	
 70	### 技术特性
 71	- ✅ 参数验证
 72	- ✅ 全局异常处理
 73	- ✅ 分页和排序
 74	- ✅ 事务管理
 75	- ✅ 单元测试
 76	- ✅ 日志记录
 77	
 78	## 快速开始
 79	
 80	### 1. 克隆项目
 81	```bash
 82	git clone <repository-url>
 83	cd springboot-demo
 84	```
 85	
 86	### 2. 运行项目
 87	```bash
 88	mvn spring-boot:run
 89	```
 90	
 91	### 3. 访问应用
 92	- 应用地址: http://localhost:8080
 93	- H2控制台: http://localhost:8080/h2-console
 94	 - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:testdb`
 95	 - 用户名: `sa`
 96	 - 密码: `password`
...
 144	```
 145	
 146	#### 删除用户
 147	```http
 148	DELETE /api/users/{id}
 149	```
 150	
 151	#### 激活/停用用户
 152	```http
 153	PATCH /api/users/{id}/status?active=true
 154	```
 155	
 156	#### 搜索用户
 157	```http
 158	GET /api/users/search?username=test
 159	```
 160	
 161	## 测试
 162	
 163	### 运行所有测试
 164	```bash
 165	mvn test
 166	```
 167	
 168	### 运行特定测试
 169	```bash
 170	mvn test -Dtest=UserControllerTest
 171	```
 172	
 173	## 配置
 174	
 175	### 开发环境
 176	项目默认使用H2内存数据库，无需额外配置。
 177	
 178	### 生产环境
 179	1. 修改 `application.yml` 中的数据库配置
 180	2. 取消MySQL配置的注释
 181	3. 注释掉H2相关配置
 182	
 183	## 部署
 184	
 185	### 构建JAR包
 186	```bash
 187	mvn clean package
 188	```
 189	
 190	### 运行JAR包
 191	```bash
 192	java -jar target/springboot-demo-1.0.0.jar
 193	```
 194	
 195	## 贡献
 196	
 197	1. Fork 项目
 198	2. 创建特性分支 (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
 199	3. 提交更改 (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
 200	4. 推送到分支 (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
 201	5. 打开 Pull Request
 202	
 203	## 许可证
 204	
 205	本项目采用 MIT 许可证 - 查看 [LICENSE](LICENSE) 文件了解详情。

Path: src/main/java/com/example/demo/controller/UserController.java
 1	package com.example.demo.controller;
 2	
 3	import com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;
 4	import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
 5	import javax.validation.Valid;
 6	import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
 7	import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
 8	import org.springframework.data.domain.Page;
 9	import org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;
 10	import org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;
 11	import org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;
 12	import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
 13	import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
 14	import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
 15	
 16	import java.util.List;
 17	
 18	/**
 19	 * 用户控制器
 20	 * 
 21	 * @author example
 22	 * @version 1.0.0
 23	 */
 24	@Slf4j
 25	@RestController
 26	@RequestMapping("/api/users")
 27	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 28	public class UserController {
 29	
 30	 private final UserService userService;
 31	
 32	 /**
 33	 * 创建用户
 34	 */
 35	 @PostMapping
 36	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {
 37	 log.info("Creating user: {}", request.getUsername());
 38	 UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);
 39	 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 40	 }
 41	
 42	 /**
 43	 * 根据ID获取用户
 44	 */
 45	 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 46	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 47	 log.info("Getting user by ID: {}", id);
 48	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);
 49	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 50	 }
 51	
 52	 /**
 53	 * 根据用户名获取用户
 54	 */
 55	 @GetMapping("/username/{username}")
 56	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {
 57	 log.info("Getting user by username: {}", username);
 58	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);
 59	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 60	 }
 61	
 62	 /**
 63	 * 获取所有用户（分页）
 64	 */
 65	 @GetMapping
 66	 public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(
 67	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "0") int page,
 68	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") int size,
 69	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "id") String sortBy,
 70	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "asc") String sortDir) {
 71	 
 72	 log.info("Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}", 
 73	 page, size, sortBy, sortDir);
 74	 
 75	 Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase("desc") ? 
 76	 Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();
 77	 Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);
 78	 
 79	 Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);
 80	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 81	 }
...
 113	
 114	 /**
 115	 * 激活/停用用户
 116	 */
 117	 @PatchMapping("/{id}/status")
 118	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, 
 119	 @RequestParam Boolean active) {
 120	 log.info("Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}", id, active);
 121	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);
 122	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 123	 }
 124	
 125	 /**
 126	 * 搜索用户
 127	 */
 128	 @GetMapping("/search")
 129	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {
 130	 log.info("Searching users by username: {}", username);
 131	 List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);
 132	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 133	 }
 134	}

 6	
 7	 public static final int StatusFirstFrame = 0;
 8	 public static final int StatusContinueFrame = 1;
 9	 public static final int StatusLastFrame = 2;

 12	 private final AuthUtil authUtil;
 13	
 14	 private WebSocket webSocket;

 16	 private String apiUrl;

 18	 public IatWebSocketClient(SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService, AuthUtil authUtil) {
 19	 this.recognitionService = recognitionService;
 20	 this.authUtil = authUtil;
 21	 this.client = new OkHttpClient.Builder().build();
 22	 initializeConnection();
 23	 }

 86	
 87	 @Override
 88	 public void onMessage(WebSocket webSocket, String text) {
 89	 Gson gson = new Gson();
 90	 IatResponse response = gson.fromJson(text, IatResponse.class);
 91	
 92	 if (response != null && response.getCode() == 0 && response.getData() != null) {
 93	 if (response.getData().getStatus() == 2) {
 94	 recognitionService.handleRecognitionResult(response.getData().getResult().getText());
 95	 } else {
 96	 // 处理中间结果
 97	 recognitionService.handleRecognitionResult(response.getData().getResult().getText());
 98	 }
 99	 }
 100	 }
 101	
 102	 @Override
 103	 public void onFailure(WebSocket webSocket, Throwable t, Response response) {
 104	 logger.error("WebSocket error", t);
 105	 // 实现重连逻辑
 106	 initializeConnection();
 107	 }

 28	 show-sql: true
 29	 format-sql: true
 30	 properties:
 31	 hibernate:
 32	 dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.H2Dialect
 33	 # dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL8Dialect # MySQL使用这个
 34	 open-in-view: false

 41

 45	 enabled: true
 46	 livereload:
 47	 enabled: true
 48	
 49	# 日志配置
 50	logging:
 51	 level:
 52	 com.example.demo: DEBUG
 53	 org.springframework.web: DEBUG
 54	 org.hibernate.SQL: DEBUG
 55	 org.hibernate.type.descriptor.sql.BasicBinder: TRACE
 56	 pattern:
 57	 console: "%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} - %msg%n"
 58	 file: "%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} [%thread] %-5level %logger{36} - %msg%n"
 59	 file:
 60	 name: logs/application.log
 61	
 62	# 管理端点配置

 64	 endpoints:
 65	 web:
 66	 exposure:
 67	 include: health,info,metrics
 68	 endpoint:
 69	 health:
 70	 show-details: when-authorized

"package com.example.demo.controller;\n\nimport com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;\nimport com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;\nimport com.example.demo.service.UserService;\nimport javax.validation.Valid;\nimport lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Page;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * \u7528\u6237\u63a7\u5236\u5668\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/users\")\n@RequiredArgsConstructor\npublic class UserController {\n\n private final UserService userService;\n\n /**\n * \u521b\u5efa\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {\n log.info(\"Creating user: {}\", request.getUsername());\n UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636eID\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u7528\u6237\u540d\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/username/{username}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by username: {}\", username);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u7528\u6237\uff08\u5206\u9875\uff09\n */\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"0\") int page,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"10\") int size,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"id\") String sortBy,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"asc\") String sortDir) {\n \n log.info(\"Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}\", \n page, size, sortBy, sortDir);\n \n Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase(\"desc\") ? \n Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();\n Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);\n \n Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/active\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getActiveUsers() {\n log.info(\"Getting active users\");\n List<UserDTO> activeUsers = userService.getActiveUsers();\n return ResponseEntity.ok(activeUsers);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, \n @Valid @RequestBody UserDTO userDTO) {\n log.info(\"Updating user with ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.updateUser(id, userDTO);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n */\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Deleting user with ID: {}\", id);\n userService.deleteUser(id);\n return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PatchMapping(\"/{id}/status\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, \n @RequestParam Boolean active) {\n log.info(\"Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}\", id, active);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/search\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {\n log.info(\"Searching users by username: {}\", username);\n List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"UserController文件不存在，让我重新创建它：

"file_content": "package com.example.demo.handler;\n\nimport com.example.demo.service.AudioCaptureService;\nimport com.example.demo.service.SpeechRecognitionService;\nimport lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Component;\nimport org.springframework.web.socket.CloseStatus;\nimport org.springframework.web.socket.TextMessage;\nimport org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession;\nimport org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler;\n\n/**\n * \u8bed\u97f3WebSocket\u5904\u7406\u5668\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@Component\n@RequiredArgsConstructor\npublic class SpeechWebSocketHandler extends TextWebSocketHandler {\n\n private final AudioCaptureService audioCaptureService;\n private final SpeechRecognitionService speechRecognitionService;\n\n @Override\n public void afterConnectionEstablished(WebSocketSession session) throws Exception {\n log.info(\"WebSocket connection established: {}\", session.getId());\n super.afterConnectionEstablished(session);\n }\n\n @Override\n protected void handleTextMessage(WebSocketSession session, TextMessage message) throws Exception {\n String payload = message.getPayload();\n log.info(\"Received message: {}\", payload);\n \n // \u5904\u7406\u4e0d\u540c\u7c7b\u578b\u7684\u6d88\u606f\n if (\"start\".equals(payload)) {\n audioCaptureService.startCapture();\n session.sendMessage(new TextMessage(\"Audio capture started\"));\n } else if (\"stop\".equals(payload)) {\n audioCaptureService.stopCapture();\n speechRecognitionService.endRecognition();\n session.sendMessage(new TextMessage(\"Audio capture stopped\"));\n }\n }\n\n @Override\n public void afterConnectionClosed(WebSocketSession session, CloseStatus status) throws Exception {\n log.info(\"WebSocket connection closed: {}, status: {}\", session.getId(), status);\n audioCaptureService.stopCapture();\n super.afterConnectionClosed(session, status);\n }\n\n @Override\n public void handleTransportError(WebSocketSession session, Throwable exception) throws Exception {\n log.error(\"WebSocket transport error: {}\", session.getId(), exception);\n super.handleTransportError(session, exception);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"## 4. 创建缺少的SpeechWebSocketHandler类

javax.crypto.Mac;\nimport javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec;\nimport java.net.URL;\nimport java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;\nimport java.security.MessageDigest;\nimport java.text.SimpleDateFormat;\nimport java.util.Base64;\nimport java.util.Date;\nimport java.util.Locale;\nimport java.util.TimeZone;\n\n/**\n * \u8baf\u98deAPI\u8ba4\u8bc1\u5de5\u5177\u7c7b\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@Component\npublic class AuthUtil {\n\n @Value(\"${xfyun.appid:your_app_id}\")\n private String appId;\n\n @Value(\"${xfyun.api-key:your_api_key}\")\n private String apiKey;\n\n @Value(\"${xfyun.api-secret:your_api_secret}\")\n private String apiSecret;\n\n /**\n * \u751f\u6210\u8ba4\u8bc1URL\n */\n public String getAuthUrl(String hostUrl, String requestUrl) {\n try {\n URL url = new URL(hostUrl + requestUrl);\n \n // \u751f\u6210RFC1123\u683c\u5f0f\u7684\u65f6\u95f4\u6233\n SimpleDateFormat format = new SimpleDateFormat(\"EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss z\", Locale.US);\n format.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone(\"GMT\"));\n String date = format.format(new Date());\n\n // \u62fc\u63a5\u5b57\u7b26\u4e32\n String preStr = \"host: \" + url.getHost() + \"\\n\" +\n \"date: \" + date + \"\\n\" +\n \"GET \" + url.getPath() + \" HTTP/1.1\";\n\n // SHA256\u52a0\u5bc6\n Mac mac = Mac.getInstance(\"hmacsha256\");\n SecretKeySpec spec = new SecretKeySpec(apiSecret.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), \"hmacsha256\");\n mac.init(spec);\n byte[] hexDigits = mac.doFinal(preStr.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));\n String sha = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(hexDigits);\n\n // \u62fc\u63a5authorization\n String authorization = String.format(\"api_key=\\\"%s\\\", algorithm=\\\"%s\\\", headers=\\\"%s\\\", signature=\\\"%s\\\"\",\n apiKey, \"hmac-sha256\", \"host date request-line\", sha);\n\n // \u751f\u6210\u8ba4\u8bc1URL\n String authUrl = hostUrl + requestUrl + \"?\" +\n \"authorization=\" + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(authorization.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) +\n \"&date=\" + date +\n \"&host=\" + url.getHost();\n\n log.debug(\"Generated auth URL: {}\", authUrl);\n return authUrl;\n\n } catch (Exception e) {\n log.error(\"Failed to generate auth URL\", e);\n throw new RuntimeException(\"Failed to generate auth URL\", e);\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6AppId\n */\n public String getAppId() {\n return appId;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"## 5. 创建缺少的AuthUtil类

 38	 }

 40	 frame.add("common", common);
 41	 frame.add("business", business);
 42	 return frame;
 43	 }

 45	
 46	## 技术栈
 47	
 48	- **Spring Boot 3.2.0** - 主框架
 49	- **Spring Data JPA** - 数据访问
 50	- **Spring Web** - Web层
 51	- **H2 Database** - 内存数据库（开发环境）
 52	- **MySQL** - 生产数据库
 53	- **Lombok** - 减少样板代码
 54	- **JUnit 5** - 单元测试
 55	- **Maven** - 构建工具
 56	
 57	## 功能特性
 58	
 59	### 用户管理API
 60	- ✅ 创建用户
 61	- ✅ 根据ID查询用户
 62	- ✅ 根据用户名查询用户
 63	- ✅ 分页查询所有用户
 64	- ✅ 查询活跃用户
 65	- ✅ 更新用户信息
 66	- ✅ 删除用户
 67	- ✅ 激活/停用用户
 68	- ✅ 用户名搜索
 69	
 70	### 技术特性
 71	- ✅ 参数验证
 72	- ✅ 全局异常处理
 73	- ✅ 分页和排序
 74	- ✅ 事务管理
 75	- ✅ 单元测试
 76	- ✅ 日志记录
 77	
 78	## 快速开始
 79	
 80	### 1. 克隆项目
 81	```bash
 82	git clone <repository-url>
 83	cd springboot-demo
 84	```
 85	
 86	### 2. 运行项目
 87	```bash
 88	mvn spring-boot:run
 89	```
 90	
 91	### 3. 访问应用
 92	- 应用地址: http://localhost:8080
 93	- H2控制台: http://localhost:8080/h2-console
 94	 - JDBC URL: `jdbc:h2:mem:testdb`
 95	 - 用户名: `sa`
 96	 - 密码: `password`
...
 144	```
 145	
 146	#### 删除用户
 147	```http
 148	DELETE /api/users/{id}
 149	```
 150	
 151	#### 激活/停用用户
 152	```http
 153	PATCH /api/users/{id}/status?active=true
 154	```
 155	
 156	#### 搜索用户
 157	```http
 158	GET /api/users/search?username=test
 159	```
 160	
 161	## 测试
 162	
 163	### 运行所有测试
 164	```bash
 165	mvn test
 166	```
 167	
 168	### 运行特定测试
 169	```bash
 170	mvn test -Dtest=UserControllerTest
 171	```
 172	
 173	## 配置
 174	
 175	### 开发环境
 176	项目默认使用H2内存数据库，无需额外配置。
 177	
 178	### 生产环境
 179	1. 修改 `application.yml` 中的数据库配置
 180	2. 取消MySQL配置的注释
 181	3. 注释掉H2相关配置
 182	
 183	## 部署
 184	
 185	### 构建JAR包
 186	```bash
 187	mvn clean package
 188	```
 189	
 190	### 运行JAR包
 191	```bash
 192	java -jar target/springboot-demo-1.0.0.jar
 193	```
 194	
 195	## 贡献
 196	
 197	1. Fork 项目
 198	2. 创建特性分支 (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
 199	3. 提交更改 (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
 200	4. 推送到分支 (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
 201	5. 打开 Pull Request
 202	
 203	## 许可证
 204	
 205	本项目采用 MIT 许可证 - 查看 [LICENSE](LICENSE) 文件了解详情。

Path: src/main/java/com/example/demo/controller/UserController.java
 1	package com.example.demo.controller;
 2	
 3	import com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;
 4	import com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;
 5	import com.example.demo.service.UserService;
 6	import javax.validation.Valid;
 7	import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
 8	import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
 9	import org.springframework.data.domain.Page;
 10	import org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;
 11	import org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;
 12	import org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;
 13	import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
 14	import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
 15	import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
 16	
 17	import java.util.List;
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * 用户控制器
 21	 * 
 22	 * @author example
 23	 * @version 1.0.0
 24	 */
 25	@Slf4j
 26	@RestController
 27	@RequestMapping("/api/users")
 28	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 29	public class UserController {
 30	
 31	 private final UserService userService;
 32	
 33	 /**
 34	 * 创建用户
 35	 */
 36	 @PostMapping
 37	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {
 38	 log.info("Creating user: {}", request.getUsername());
 39	 UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);
 40	 return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 /**
 44	 * 根据ID获取用户
 45	 */
 46	 @GetMapping("/{id}")
 47	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {
 48	 log.info("Getting user by ID: {}", id);
 49	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);
 50	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 51	 }
 52	
 53	 /**
 54	 * 根据用户名获取用户
 55	 */
 56	 @GetMapping("/username/{username}")
 57	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {
 58	 log.info("Getting user by username: {}", username);
 59	 UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);
 60	 return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 /**
 64	 * 获取所有用户（分页）
 65	 */
 66	 @GetMapping
 67	 public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(
 68	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "0") int page,
 69	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "10") int size,
 70	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "id") String sortBy,
 71	 @RequestParam(defaultValue = "asc") String sortDir) {
 72	 
 73	 log.info("Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}", 
 74	 page, size, sortBy, sortDir);
 75	 
 76	 Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase("desc") ? 
 77	 Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();
 78	 Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);
 79	 
 80	 Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);
 81	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 82	 }
 83	
 84	 /**
 85	 * 获取活跃用户
 86	 */
 87	 @GetMapping("/active")
 88	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getActiveUsers() {
 89	 log.info("Getting active users");
 90	 List<UserDTO> activeUsers = userService.getActiveUsers();
 91	 return ResponseEntity.ok(activeUsers);
 92	 }
 93	
 94	 /**
 95	 * 更新用户
 96	 */
 97	 @PutMapping("/{id}")
 98	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, 
 99	 @Valid @RequestBody UserDTO userDTO) {
 100	 log.info("Updating user with ID: {}", id);
 101	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.updateUser(id, userDTO);
 102	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 103	 }
 104	
 105	 /**
 106	 * 删除用户
 107	 */
 108	 @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
 109	 public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) {
 110	 log.info("Deleting user with ID: {}", id);
 111	 userService.deleteUser(id);
 112	 return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();
 113	 }
 114	
 115	 /**
 116	 * 激活/停用用户
 117	 */
 118	 @PatchMapping("/{id}/status")
 119	 public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, 
 120	 @RequestParam Boolean active) {
 121	 log.info("Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}", id, active);
 122	 UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);
 123	 return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);
 124	 }
 125	
 126	 /**
 127	 * 搜索用户
 128	 */
 129	 @GetMapping("/search")
 130	 public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {
 131	 log.info("Searching users by username: {}", username);
 132	 List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);
 133	 return ResponseEntity.ok(users);
 134	 }
 135	}

...
 12	
 13	/**
 14	 * 语音WebSocket处理器
 15	 * 
 16	 * @author example
 17	 * @version 1.0.0
 18	 */
 19	@Slf4j
 20	@Component
 21	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 22	public class SpeechWebSocketHandler extends TextWebSocketHandler {
 23	
 24	 private final AudioCaptureService audioCaptureService;
 25	 private final SpeechRecognitionService speechRecognitionService;
 26	
 27	 @Override
 28	 public void afterConnectionEstablished(WebSocketSession session) throws Exception {
 29	 log.info("WebSocket connection established: {}", session.getId());
 30	 super.afterConnectionEstablished(session);
 31	 }
 32	
 33	 @Override
 34	 protected void handleTextMessage(WebSocketSession session, TextMessage message) throws Exception {
 35	 String payload = message.getPayload();
 36	 log.info("Received message: {}", payload);
 37	 
 38	 // 处理不同类型的消息
 39	 if ("start".equals(payload)) {
 40	 audioCaptureService.startCapture();
 41	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage("Audio capture started"));
 42	 } else if ("stop".equals(payload)) {
 43	 audioCaptureService.stopCapture();
 44	 speechRecognitionService.endRecognition();
 45	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage("Audio capture stopped"));
 46	 }
 47	 }

 1	package com.example.demo.util;
 2	
 3	import org.springframework.web.socket.CloseStatus;
 4	import org.springframework.web.socket.TextMessage;
 5	import org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession;
 6	import org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler;
 7	
 8	import java.io.IOException;
 9	import java.util.Map;
 10	import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
 11	
 12	public class SpeechWebSocketHandler extends TextWebSocketHandler {
 13	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SpeechWebSocketHandler.class);
 14	
 15	 private final Map<String, WebSocketSession> sessions = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
 16	 private final SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService;
 17	 private final IatRequest defaultIatRequest;
 18	
 19	 public SpeechWebSocketHandler(SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService,
 20	 IatRequest defaultIatRequest) {
 21	 this.recognitionService = recognitionService;
 22	 this.defaultIatRequest = defaultIatRequest;
 23	 }
 24	
 25	 @Override
 26	 public void afterConnectionEstablished(WebSocketSession session) throws Exception {
 27	 sessions.put(session.getId(), session);
 28	 logger.info("新的WebSocket连接: {}", session.getId());
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 @Override
 32	 protected void handleTextMessage(WebSocketSession session, TextMessage message) throws Exception {
 33	 String payload = message.getPayload();
 34	 logger.info("收到WebSocket消息: {}", payload);
 35	
 36	 try {
 37	 Map<String, Object> data = new Gson().fromJson(payload, Map.class);
 38	 String action = (String) data.get("action");
 39	
 40	 if ("start".equals(action)) {
 41	 // 使用前端传来的参数更新IatRequest
 42	 Map<String, String> params = (Map<String, String>) data.get("params");
 43	 IatRequest request = defaultIatRequest.clone();
 44	
 45	 if (params != null) {
 46	 if (params.containsKey("language")) {
 47	 request.setLanguage(params.get("language"));
 48	 }
 49	 if (params.containsKey("domain")) {
 50	 request.setDomain(params.get("domain"));
 51	 }
 52	 if (params.containsKey("accent")) {
 53	 request.setAccent(params.get("accent"));
 54	 }
 55	 }
 56	
 57	 // 设置结果处理器
 58	 recognitionService.setResultHandler(result -> {
 59	 try {
 60	 if (session.isOpen()) {
 61	 String json = String.format("{\"final\":%b, \"text\":\"%s\"}",
 62	 result.isFinal(), result.getText());
 63	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage(json));
 64	 }
 65	 } catch (IOException e) {
 66	 logger.error("发送WebSocket消息失败", e);
 67	 }
 68	 });
 69	
 70	 recognitionService.startRecognition(request);
 71	
 72	 } else if ("stop".equals(action)) {
 73	 recognitionService.stopRecognition();
 74	 }
 75	 } catch (Exception e) {
 76	 logger.error("处理WebSocket消息失败", e);
 77	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage("{\"error\":\"Invalid message format\"}"));
 78	 }
 79	 }
 80	
 81	 @Override
 82	 public void afterConnectionClosed(WebSocketSession session, CloseStatus status) throws Exception {
 83	 sessions.remove(session.getId());
 84	 recognitionService.stopRecognition();
 85	 logger.info("WebSocket连接关闭: {}, 状态: {}", session.getId(), status);
 86	 }
 87	}

 1	import org.springframework.web.socket.CloseStatus;
 2	import org.springframework.web.socket.TextMessage;
 3	import org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession;
 4	import org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler;
 5	
 6	import java.io.IOException;
 7	import java.util.Map;
 8	import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
 9	
 10	public class SpeechWebSocketHandler extends TextWebSocketHandler {
 11	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SpeechWebSocketHandler.class);
 12	
 13	 private final Map<String, WebSocketSession> sessions = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
 14	 private final SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService;
 15	 private final IatRequest defaultIatRequest;
 16	
 17	 public SpeechWebSocketHandler(SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService,
 18	 IatRequest defaultIatRequest) {
 19	 this.recognitionService = recognitionService;
 20	 this.defaultIatRequest = defaultIatRequest;
 21	 }
 22	
 23	 @Override
 24	 public void afterConnectionEstablished(WebSocketSession session) throws Exception {
 25	 sessions.put(session.getId(), session);
 26	 logger.info("新的WebSocket连接: {}", session.getId());
 27	 }
 28	
 29	 @Override
 30	 protected void handleTextMessage(WebSocketSession session, TextMessage message) throws Exception {
 31	 String payload = message.getPayload();
 32	 logger.info("收到WebSocket消息: {}", payload);
 33	
 34	 try {
 35	 Map<String, Object> data = new Gson().fromJson(payload, Map.class);
 36	 String action = (String) data.get("action");
 37	
 38	 if ("start".equals(action)) {
 39	 // 使用前端传来的参数更新IatRequest
 40	 Map<String, String> params = (Map<String, String>) data.get("params");
 41	 IatRequest request = defaultIatRequest.clone();
 42	
 43	 if (params != null) {
 44	 if (params.containsKey("language")) {
 45	 request.setLanguage(params.get("language"));
 46	 }
 47	 if (params.containsKey("domain")) {
 48	 request.setDomain(params.get("domain"));
 49	 }
 50	 if (params.containsKey("accent")) {
 51	 request.setAccent(params.get("accent"));
 52	 }
 53	 }
 54	
 55	 // 设置结果处理器
 56	 recognitionService.setResultHandler(result -> {
 57	 try {
 58	 if (session.isOpen()) {
 59	 String json = String.format("{\"final\":%b, \"text\":\"%s\"}",
 60	 result.isFinal(), result.getText());
 61	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage(json));
 62	 }
 63	 } catch (IOException e) {
 64	 logger.error("发送WebSocket消息失败", e);
 65	 }
 66	 });
 67	
 68	 recognitionService.startRecognition(request);
 69	
 70	 } else if ("stop".equals(action)) {
 71	 recognitionService.stopRecognition();
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (Exception e) {
 74	 logger.error("处理WebSocket消息失败", e);
 75	 session.sendMessage(new TextMessage("{\"error\":\"Invalid message format\"}"));
 76	 }
 77	 }
 78	
 79	 @Override
 80	 public void afterConnectionClosed(WebSocketSession session, CloseStatus status) throws Exception {
 81	 sessions.remove(session.getId());
 82	 recognitionService.stopRecognition();
 83	 logger.info("WebSocket连接关闭: {}, 状态: {}", session.getId(), status);
 84	 }
 85	}

"package com.example.demo.controller;\n\nimport com.example.demo.dto.CreateUserRequest;\nimport com.example.demo.dto.UserDTO;\nimport com.example.demo.service.UserService;\nimport javax.validation.Valid;\nimport lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;\nimport lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Page;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;\nimport org.springframework.data.domain.Sort;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * \u7528\u6237\u63a7\u5236\u5668\n * \n * @author example\n * @version 1.0.0\n */\n@Slf4j\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/users\")\n@RequiredArgsConstructor\npublic class UserController {\n\n private final UserService userService;\n\n /**\n * \u521b\u5efa\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> createUser(@Valid @RequestBody CreateUserRequest request) {\n log.info(\"Creating user: {}\", request.getUsername());\n UserDTO createdUser = userService.createUser(request);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdUser, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636eID\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserById(id);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6839\u636e\u7528\u6237\u540d\u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/username/{username}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username) {\n log.info(\"Getting user by username: {}\", username);\n UserDTO user = userService.getUserByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(user);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u7528\u6237\uff08\u5206\u9875\uff09\n */\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity<Page<UserDTO>> getAllUsers(\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"0\") int page,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"10\") int size,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"id\") String sortBy,\n @RequestParam(defaultValue = \"asc\") String sortDir) {\n \n log.info(\"Getting all users - page: {}, size: {}, sortBy: {}, sortDir: {}\", \n page, size, sortBy, sortDir);\n \n Sort sort = sortDir.equalsIgnoreCase(\"desc\") ? \n Sort.by(sortBy).descending() : Sort.by(sortBy).ascending();\n Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(page, size, sort);\n \n Page<UserDTO> users = userService.getAllUsers(pageable);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u6d3b\u8dc3\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/active\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> getActiveUsers() {\n log.info(\"Getting active users\");\n List<UserDTO> activeUsers = userService.getActiveUsers();\n return ResponseEntity.ok(activeUsers);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, \n @Valid @RequestBody UserDTO userDTO) {\n log.info(\"Updating user with ID: {}\", id);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.updateUser(id, userDTO);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u5220\u9664\u7528\u6237\n */\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id) {\n log.info(\"Deleting user with ID: {}\", id);\n userService.deleteUser(id);\n return ResponseEntity.noContent().build();\n }\n\n /**\n * \u6fc0\u6d3b/\u505c\u7528\u7528\u6237\n */\n @PatchMapping(\"/{id}/status\")\n public ResponseEntity<UserDTO> toggleUserStatus(@PathVariable Long id, \n @RequestParam Boolean active) {\n log.info(\"Toggling user status for ID: {}, active: {}\", id, active);\n UserDTO updatedUser = userService.toggleUserStatus(id, active);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(updatedUser);\n }\n\n /**\n * \u641c\u7d22\u7528\u6237\n */\n @GetMapping(\"/search\")\n public ResponseEntity<List<UserDTO>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String username) {\n log.info(\"Searching users by username: {}\", username);\n List<UserDTO> users = userService.searchUsersByUsername(username);\n return ResponseEntity.ok(users);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"确实，`UserController.java`文件不存在。让我重新创建它：

 3	import com.example.demo.handler.SpeechWebSocketHandler;
