 11	 *
 12	 * @author example
 13	 * @version 1.0.0
 14	 */
 15	@Service
 16	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 17	public class SpeechRecognitionService {
 18	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SpeechRecognitionService.class);
 19	
 20	 private final IatWebSocketClient webSocketClient;
 21	
 22	 private int status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusFirstFrame;
 23	 private boolean isFirstFrame = true;
 24	
 25	 public void processAudioFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 26	 if (isFirstFrame) {
 27	 sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 28	 isFirstFrame = false;
 29	 } else {
 30	 sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 31	 }
 32	 }
 33	
 34	 private void sendFirstFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 35	 webSocketClient.sendFirstFrame(audioData, length);
 36	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusContinueFrame;
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 private void sendContinueFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {
 40	 webSocketClient.sendContinueFrame(audioData, length);
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 public void endRecognition() {
 44	 webSocketClient.sendLastFrame();
 45	 isFirstFrame = true;
 46	 status = IatWebSocketClient.StatusFirstFrame;
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 public void handleRecognitionResult(String result) {
 50	 // 处理识别结果，可以通过事件或WebSocket转发给前端
 51	 logger.info("Recognition result: {}", result);
 52	 }
 53	}

 1	package com.example.demo.service;
 2	
 3	import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
 4	import org.slf4j.Logger;
 5	import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
 6	import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
 7	
 8	import javax.sound.sampled.*;
 9	
 10	/**
 11	 * 音频捕获服务
 12	 *
 13	 * @author example
 14	 * @version 1.0.0
 15	 */
 16	@Service
 17	@RequiredArgsConstructor
 18	public class AudioCaptureService {
 19	 private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AudioCaptureService.class);
 20	
 21	 private final SpeechRecognitionService recognitionService;
 22	
 23	 private TargetDataLine targetDataLine;
 24	 private boolean isCapturing = false;
 25	
 26	 // 音频格式配置
 27	 private static final AudioFormat AUDIO_FORMAT = new AudioFormat(
 28	 16000, // 采样率 16kHz
 29	 16, // 采样位数
 30	 1, // 单声道
 31	 true, // 有符号
 32	 false // 小端序
 33	 );
 34	
 35	 public void startCapture() {
 36	 if (isCapturing) {
 37	 logger.warn("Audio capture is already running");
 38	 return;
 39	 }
 40	
 41	 try {
 42	 DataLine.Info info = new DataLine.Info(TargetDataLine.class, AUDIO_FORMAT);
 43	 targetDataLine = (TargetDataLine) AudioSystem.getLine(info);
 44	 targetDataLine.open(AUDIO_FORMAT);
 45	 targetDataLine.start();
 46	
 47	 isCapturing = true;
 48	 new Thread(this::captureAudio).start();
 49	 logger.info("Audio capture started");
 50	 } catch (LineUnavailableException e) {
 51	 logger.error("Failed to start audio capture", e);
 52	 }
 53	 }
 54	
 55	 public void stopCapture() {
 56	 isCapturing = false;
 57	 if (targetDataLine != null) {
 58	 targetDataLine.stop();
 59	 targetDataLine.close();
 60	 logger.info("Audio capture stopped");
 61	 }
 62	 }
 63	
 64	 private void captureAudio() {
 65	 int frameSize = 1280; // 每40ms的音频数据 (16000Hz * 16bit * 1channel * 0.04s / 8 = 1280 bytes)
 66	 byte[] buffer = new byte[frameSize];
 67	
 68	 while (isCapturing) {
 69	 int bytesRead = targetDataLine.read(buffer, 0, frameSize);
 70	 if (bytesRead > 0) {
 71	 recognitionService.processAudioFrame(buffer, bytesRead);
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 }
 75	}

 43	 data.addProperty("audio", Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(audioData));
 44	
 45	 frame.add("data", data);
 46	 webSocket.send(frame.toString());
 47	 }

 52	 public void sendContinueFrame(byte[] audioData, int length) {

 26	 @Value("${xfyun.iat.app-id}")

 28

 30	 private String apiKey;

 36	 private String hostUrl;
 37	
 38	 public String getAuthUrl() throws Exception {
 39	 URL url = new URL(hostUrl);
 40	 SimpleDateFormat format = new SimpleDateFormat("EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss z", Locale.US);
 41	 format.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone("GMT"));
 42	 String date = format.format(new Date());
 43	
 44	 StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder("host: ").append(url.getHost()).append("\n")
 45	 .append("date: ").append(date).append("\n")
 46	 .append("GET ").append(url.getPath()).append(" HTTP/1.1");
 47	
 48	 Mac mac = Mac.getInstance("hmacsha256");
 49	 SecretKeySpec spec = new SecretKeySpec(apiSecret.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), "hmacsha256");
 50	 mac.init(spec);
 51	 byte[] hexDigits = mac.doFinal(builder.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
 52	 String sha = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(hexDigits);
 53	
 54	 String authorization = String.format("api_key=\"%s\", algorithm=\"%s\", headers=\"%s\", signature=\"%s\"",
 55	 apiKey, "hmac-sha256", "host date request-line", sha);
 56	
 57	 String authParam = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(authorization.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
 58	 String authUrl = "https://" + url.getHost() + url.getPath() +
 59	 "?authorization=" + authParam +
 60	 "&date=" + date +
 61	 "&host=" + url.getHost();
 62	
 63	 return authUrl;
 64	 }
 65	}

 1	package com.example.demo.dto;
 2	
 3	import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
 4	import lombok.Data;
 5	
 6	@Data
 7	public class IatRequest {
 8	 // 必填参数
 9	 private String appId;
 10	 private String language; // 语言: zh_cn（中文）、en_us（英文）等
 11	 private String domain; // 领域: iat（日常用语）、medical（医疗）等
 12	
 13	 // 可选参数
 14	 private String accent; // 方言: mandarin（普通话）、cantonese（粤语）等
 15	 private Boolean ptt; // 是否加标点（true/false）
 16	 private String dwa; // 动态修正: wpgs（开启）
 17	
 18	 // 转换为讯飞API要求的JSON格式
 19	 public JsonObject toFirstFrameJson() {
 20	 JsonObject frame = new JsonObject();
 21	 JsonObject common = new JsonObject();
 22	 JsonObject business = new JsonObject();
 23	
 24	 // 填充公共参数
 25	 common.addProperty("app_id", this.appId);
 26	
 27	 // 填充业务参数
 28	 business.addProperty("language", this.language);
 29	 business.addProperty("domain", this.domain);
 30	 if (this.accent != null) {
 31	 business.addProperty("accent", this.accent);
 32	 }
 33	 if (this.ptt != null) {
 34	 business.addProperty("ptt", this.ptt);
 35	 }
 36	 if (this.dwa != null) {
 37	 business.addProperty("dwa", this.dwa);
 38	 }
 39	
 40	 frame.add("common", common);
 41	 frame.add("business", business);
 42	 return frame;
 43	 }
 44	}
